column4: How do I get a multimedia-ready kernel for my system? Google isn't helping.
the kernel has  not much to do with multimedia

to quote the rosegarden manual: "It is theoretically possible to run JACK and Rosegarden with an  ordinary kernel, but I have never obtained acceptable results, even on  machine with fairly high specs. CPU power and abundant RAM are  insufficient to guarantee reliable performance, and you will,  unfortunately, need to run a specialized kernel."
dunno, but when was that written?
